summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FieldForce Help Center with AI Assistant. All 22 articles with comprehensive content verified. AI Assistant backend refactored to MongoDB - all endpoints working with proper persistence. Frontend Help Center displays all categories, articles, FAQ, troubleshooting, and AI chat integration.
passed_tests: Backend: API health check - returns healthy with database connected
Backend: /api/help-assistant/stats - returns session/message/feedback counts from MongoDB
Backend: /api/help-assistant/analytics - returns question analytics from MongoDB
Backend: /api/help-assistant/chat - creates sessions and persists to MongoDB, AI responds via GPT-5.2
Backend: /api/help-assistant/feedback - stores feedback to MongoDB and updates analytics
Backend: /api/help-assistant/sessions/{id}/history - retrieves chat history from MongoDB
Backend: MongoDB persistence verified - data persists across requests
Frontend: Help Center page loads with title 'Help Center'
Frontend: 6 categories displayed (Getting Started, Forms & Surveys, Data Collection, Analytics & Reports, Team & Collaboration, Account & Settings)
Frontend: 22 comprehensive articles available with full content
Frontend: Search functionality works - returns relevant results
Frontend: Article navigation works - Welcome article displays full content
Frontend: FAQ section loads with expandable accordion items
Frontend: AI Assistant button opens chat window
Frontend: AI Assistant powered by GPT-5.2 responds to questions
Frontend: AI responses include article links (e.g., Welcome Guide, Troubleshooting)
Frontend: Feedback buttons present in AI chat responses
seed_data_creation: Test data created during pytest run with TEST_ prefix for chat sessions and feedback
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Help Center features tested and working. MongoDB collections used: help_chat_sessions, help_chat_messages, help_feedback, help_question_analytics. Indexes created in server.py startup. AI Assistant uses GPT-5.2 via EMERGENT_LLM_KEY environment variable. Previous iteration (6) also passed all tests.
